metadata.title: CVE-2024-3854 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In some code patterns the JIT incorrectly optimized switch statements andgenerated code with out-of-bounds-reads. This vulnerability affects Firefox< 125 and Firefox ESR < 115.10.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs102 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
